lines.gurmukhi: jYsy piqbRqw pr purKY n dyiKE cwhY pUrn piqbRqw kY piq hI kY iDAwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Patibrataa Par Purakhai N Daykhiao Chaahai , Pooran Patibrataa Kai Pati Hee Kai Dhiaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a faithful wife does not like to look at another man and being sincere and faithful always supports her husband in her mind.

lines.gurmukhi: sr sirqw smuMdR cwqiRk n cwhY kwhU Aws Gn bUMd piRA piRA gun igAwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Sar Saritaa Samoundr Chaatrik N Chaahai Kaahoo , Aas Ghan Boond Pria Pria Goun Giaan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a rain-bird does not want water from a lake river or sea, but keeps on wailing for Swati drop from the clouds.

lines.gurmukhi: idnkr Er Bor cwhq nhI ckor mn bc kRm ihmkr piRA pRwn hY
lines.transliteration_english: Dinakar Aor Bhor Chaahat Nahee Chakora , Man Bach Kram Himakar Pria Praan Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as a Ruddy sheldrake does not like to look at the Sun even when the Sun is rising because the moon is his beloved in all respects.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy gurisK Awn dyv syv rhiq pY shj suBwv n AvigAw ABmwnu hY ]466]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Gursikh Aan Dayv Sayv Rahati Pai , Sahaj Soubhaav N Avagiaa Abhamaanu Hai ?466?

Shabad OS B.translation: So is a devoted disciple of the True Guru who does not worship any other god or goddess except the dearer than his life-True Guru. But, by remaining in a state of tranquility, he neither disrespects anyone nor shows the arrogance of his supremacy.  (466)
